Name: Maximize Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Defect Rate
Description: Reduce number of bugs reported per sprint

Name: Maximize Customer Satisfaction
Description: Improve stakeholder feedback score after each release

Name: Minimize Budget Variance
Description: Keep actual spend within 5% of planned budget

Name: Maximize On-time Delivery
Description: Deliver sprint work by planned end date

Name: Minimize Cycle Time
Description: Reduce time from user story creation to completion

Name: Maximize Code Coverage
Description: Increase percentage of code covered by automated tests

Name: Minimize Technical Debt
Description: Lower count of unresolved technical debt items

Name: Maximize Feature Throughput
Description: Increase number of features released per quarter

Name: Maximize Team Satisfaction
Description: Improve average team satisfaction rating from retrospectives

Name: Minimize Scope Changes
Description: Reduce number of backlog adjustments mid-sprint
